key_mistakes.reason: Neglects center control and development advantage.
Blocks the bishop and delays development.
Allows opponent to gain a strong attack.
Allows opponent to capture a crucial pawn.

recommendations: Focus on controlling the center with pawns and pieces in the opening.
Develop your pieces towards the center efficiently.
Ensure king safety by castling early.
Avoid unnecessary sacrifices; assess tactical opportunities carefully.
Maintain a strong pawn structure to support your pieces.
